title: Canada 's biodiesel production 2007 to 2019

gold: This statistic shows the annual production of biodiesel in Canada from 2007 to 2017 , with an estimated figure for 2018 , and a forecast for 2019.
The Canadian biodiesel production volume increased from 70 million liters in 2007 , to 397 million liters in 2017.
It is forecast that Canada 's production of biodiesel in 2019 will be 375 million liters .
